title: Cant upload file
body:
Hi,

I installed a docker image on openshift.
So far the docker image started and I could login as admin.
I created a project and tried to upload a file (I tried CSV and txt) the bar became red with the message: "Error during upload tap to retry".
When I clicked on imported everything dissapeared in the "Dataset" section.
The Docker Pod Log stated:

Making staticfiles
Initializing database
Operations to perform:
  Apply all migrations: admin, api, auth, authtoken, auto_labeling, contenttypes, data_export, data_import, django_celery_results, django_drf_filepond, examples, label_types, labels, projects, roles, sessions
Running migrations:
  No migrations to apply.
Creating admin
User admin already exists.
Setting password for User admin.
Starting django
